About

We are a small family owned business in this sweet neighborhood!

Our focus is to help our clients reach their health and fitness goals and we believe our service is one of the most cost effective and convenient in the area. We offer the services of a salon in a small downtown setting at a fraction of the cost of other salons. We have a private room for all clients that is fully equipped and ready to serve.
